    • generatePebbles

      public void generatePebbles​(int colour)
      Generates a set of pebbles of a certain colour. Gives random x y coordinates, if empty, makes pebble. Continues until pebble number equals board size.
      Parameters:
      colour - - colour of pebble being generated

    • countPebbles

      public int countPebbles​(int colour)
      It counts the number of a given pebble
      Parameters:
      colour - - colour of pebble being counted
      Returns:
      c - number of pebbles

      public void shiftPebbles​(int x, int y, String dir)
      Shifts the pebbles by one in the given direction
      Parameters:
      x - - pebble x-coordinate
      y - - pebble y-coordinate
      dir - - direction for shifting
